post:
Hello, As I purchased many other SYS servers, I currently do not use some servers and will gradually sell them to save cost. Below is the one at FirstHeberg:

- The server is at https://www.firstheberg.com/serveur-dedie-intel-atom : Intel Atom, 2x500G HDD, 4G RAM, 100mbps port speed

- Their network was upgraded from end of August 2014 and it has been good from that time.

- Server expiration date: 13-August-2015.

- Server is transferable (confirmed by the Support). You will need to provide your Firstheberg login to be able get transferred.

- Asking price: 50 EUR / 63 USD, via PayPal personal payment only. PM me for more information.
